name: Bastard!! Heavy Metal, Dark Fantasy - (Females & Style) - artkoikoi
description:
Bastard!! Heavy Metal, Dark Fantasy- (Females & Style) - LoRA

Consider supporting me on Patreon for more models and content. You can request a LoRA there too. (Read page description)

Anime style of Bastard!! Heavy Metal, Dark Fantasy. You can produce the characters from the anime (only females) with the right prompts. (Maybe dark schneider too, didn't test it, but he was in some pictures I've trained).

This is a LoRA that I've made because for some reason I like the style in this anime.

Try tags that has to do with their appeareance. If you want an specific character you should type their names like below.

tia_noto_yoko, red eyes, red hair, short hair

sean_ari, blonde and pink hair, multicolored hair, purple eyes, long hair

arshes_nei, elf, pointy ears, brown skin, dark skin, very long hair, black hair, green eyes

sheila_metallicana, black hair, blue hair, yellow eyes, long hair

kai_harn, blue hair, short hair, blue eyes, brown skin, spiked hair

You can probably make a custom girl with this LoRA or even bring another girl to this style.

Used orangemix VAE for most images

It should be okay with most Waifu Diffusion related models.

Please credit me when using any of my models.
Specially when merging this model.
You cannot use my models in other generation websites.
